Résumé
Kelly C. Catalfamo

Kelly C. Catalfamo (formerly Lottman) is a reporter at The Day, a daily newspaper in New London, Connecticut.

Kelly graduated from Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute in 2011 with a B.S. in Biology and from Boston University’s College of Communication in January 2013 with an M.S. in Journalism.

At RPI, Kelly was Editor in Chief of the student-run newspaper The Polytechnic.
